select service_type as serviceType,d.day,count(id) as orderCount from d left join ( SELECT id,service_type
,DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS start_time
,DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS start_time
FROM tbl_order WHERE STATUS IN (6,7,8)
AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
union SELECT id,9 as service_type
,DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS start_time
,DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS start_time
FROM tbl_order WHERE STATUS = 9 AND is_cancel = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
) t on d.day = t.start_time group by t.service_type,d.day

SELECT d.day, count( t.id ) AS orderCount, sum( t.paid_price ) AS orderAmount FROM d left join ( SELECT id,paid_price
,DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS pay_time
,DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS pay_time
FROM tbl_order_payment WHERE
DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( pay_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
) t on d.day = t.pay_time GROUP BY d.day
